projects.name: CV ANALYTICS DASHBOARD
projects.description: Developed a CV Analytics Dashboard that helps job applicants evaluate the relevance of their resume based upon the Job Description identifies missing skills and recommend improvements. Used a Gemini LLM to create an algorithm that calculates the relevance score of a resume based on job descriptions. Extract missing keywords & skills that provides applicants with insights in to areas needing for improvement. Provides relevant course recommendations based on missing skills and generate automated cover letters for applicants who’s ready for apply.

projects.name: Conversation chatbot using API
projects.description: Developed a basic Conversation chatbot using a Gemini LLM’s API that can process both text and images providing a comprehensive insight in to data
